Description: The U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission announced that nine children's product manufacturers, importers and sellers agreed to pay a total of more than $500,000 in civil penalties for allegedly violating the federal lead paint ban.

Company: Aaron Brothers Inc. and Michaels Stores
Private Litigation Case Title: Tijero v. Aaron Brothers, Inc. et al
Clark, et al v. Michaels Stores Inc, et al

Description: Michaels Stores, Inc. agreed to a $1.8 million settlement of allegations that it engaged in deceptive advertising practices by misleading consumers into thinking they were receiving steep discounts over a two year period.
